channel.title: How do I make certian npc's say something?
channel.description: The title basiclly says it all. If someone would explain how I could make the npc say something that'd be really nice :D

item.title: How do I make certian npc's say something?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

robbert ownz:

lol go to npc handler and post wat u want em to say easy just find the code to lazy to bring up but its all in npc handler, or client.java, or server.java

Hmm…are you sure?

npchandler.java:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Text"; }
[Just search if (npcs[ i].npcType ==, and add it under one of those.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make certian npc's say something?
